snippet.title: An Amazing Wizard - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description: Take a look at gameplay from An Amazing Wizard, including a tense fight against a boss in the Inferno biome in this latest video for the upcoming story-driven Metroidvania-inspired roguelite game. An Amazing Wizard will be coming to PC.
